REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0829 reute d f BC-CORRECTION---HEINEKEN 03-06 0037
REUTERS.TEXT: CORRECTION - HEINEKEN 1986 YEAR In item headlined "HEINEKEN N.V. <HEIN.AS> 1986 YEAR" please read in first line pre-tax profit 513.2 mln guilders vs 454.5 mln. Corrects year ago comparison to 454.5 mln from 545.5 mln. Reuter
